title: Customer Service Representative for E-commerce (Shopify, Gorgias, Recharge)
job_overview:
We’re looking for someone who doesn’t just do the work — but takes pride in doing it right. If you naturally pay attention to details, double-check your work, and genuinely care about every customer interaction, you’ll thrive here.

About Dsrupt Media:
Dsrupt Media is a fast-growing, dynamic company focused on helping consumer brands scale through cutting-edge ad creative.
We’re committed to delivering excellent service, paying attention to even the smallest details, and building strong, trust-based relationships with our clients. By joining Dsrupt Media, you’ll be part of a team that values innovation, teamwork, customer satisfaction, and a culture of care and excellence.

The Opportunity:
Dsrupt Media is looking for a passionate, dedicated, and highly detail-oriented Customer Service Representative to join our team. This role is perfect for someone who loves delivering exceptional customer service, has a keen eye for accuracy, and takes pride in double-checking their work to ensure every interaction is polished and professional.
Experience supporting e-commerce brands is a strong advantage.
As a Customer Service Representative at Dsrupt Media, you’ll play an important role in ensuring customer satisfaction and helping our clients experience a seamless and empathetic service journey.

Responsibilities:
As a Customer Service Representative at Dsrupt Media, you will:
-Respond promptly and accurately to customer inquiries via email, chat, and other communication channels, ensuring all information is double-checked before sending.
-Address customer concerns with professionalism, patience, and empathy, providing thoughtful and tailored solutions.
-Handle customer complaints with a calm demeanor, actively listening to understand the core issue and ensuring a timely and respectful resolution.
-Collaborate with other departments when necessary to resolve complex issues effectively.
-Ensure customers have a positive and memorable experience by maintaining a helpful, friendly, and detail-oriented approach.
-Provide constructive feedback to help improve products, services, and overall customer experience.
-Maintain a strong, updated knowledge of our e-commerce platforms and third-party apps to assist customers accurately.
-Follow customer service procedures and guidelines meticulously to ensure consistency, accuracy, and a high standard of service delivery.

About You:
-Experience with CRM systems such as Zendesk, Salesforce, or Gorgias is a MUST.
-Experience with e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Recharge, and Shiphero is a MUST.
-2+ years of experience in customer service, preferably supporting e-commerce brands.
-Excellent written and verbal English communication skills, with the ability to craft clear, thoughtful, and error-free responses.
-Strong attention to detail — you naturally double-check your work and catch inconsistencies before they reach the customer.
-Highly empathetic, with a genuine desire to help others and a calm presence under pressure.
-Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive, customer-first attitude.
-Ability to handle multiple customer queries simultaneously while maintaining accuracy and care.


Working Hours:
-Full-time position with flexibility required to provide some weekend coverage.
-Working hours are primarily aligned with the EST timezone, with weekend availability to ensure customer service continuity.

Requirements: 
NOTE: Applications that miss any of the listed requirements will not be considered.

-To ensure your application is considered, please include the word "jam" in your subject line to show you’ve thoroughly reviewed the job description.
-CV (Resume)
-A brief video introducing yourself and explaining why you are an ideal fit for this role, highlighting your attention to detail and ability to double-check your work
-3 professional references from previous employers
-Completion of the personality test: Upgrade to see actual info/free-personality-test
